view.craft

Class CraftGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.craft.CraftGrid

  • public final class CraftGrid
extends java.lang.Object
    The class responsible for the button grid of the CraftWindowImpl window.

      • createResizedIcons

        public java.util.Map<Type,javax.swing.Icon> createResizedIcons()
        Creates the resized Icon for each type in order to not re-create them at every use. Uses a ResizedTypeImage object to achieve that. Since the icon size is relative to the button size which is relative to the window size, the icons dimensions are known only when the Window is set visible. Thus, this must be public as it must be called from CraftWindowImpl in its show method.
        Returns:
        a Map which maps every Type with its own resized Icon

      • resetButtonActionListener

        public java.awt.event.ActionListener resetButtonActionListener()
        This is the action listener of the "reset" button. It tells the controller to clear the grid.
        Returns:
        the reset button action listener
